coreAttributes.authorTag: Carved into the hilt of the blade reads RETRIEVED BY TROOPS #P01-Y & #B100-M "
coreAttributes.name: Broken Reppu
coreAttributes.description:
A once proud driveblade that can no longer serve its original purpose. It could be used as a weapon as a last resort however. The tip of it has been broken clean off, and it no longer has its port or hammer #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN
" Did you just hit me with a broken sword? Why tho? " #ELSE
" You fool, you cant defeat me with a weapon like that..." #ENDIF
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Try to attack [npc2.name] using the remaining chunk of the blade.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] blade at [npc2.name], slicing the blade along [npc2.her] torso!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] blade, causing [npc2.herHim] to flinch back as the edge passes through [npc2.her] shoulder!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] blade, forcing the blade into [npc.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] blade at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim] by an inch!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] blade, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
